channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - imapsync

item.title: Trying out imapsync
item.description: Recently, I had to migrate mail boxes for a couple of users from one mail provider to another. Both mail providers used IMAP, so I looked into IMAP related synchronization methods. I quickly found the imapsync application, also supported through Gentoo's repository.
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
